pkgmetadata.longdescription: Distribution and Percentile of Sackin, Cophenetic and Colless- Like Balance Indices of Phylogenetic Trees // Computation of Colless-Like, Sackin and cophenetic balance indices of a phylogenetic tree and study of the distribution of these balance indices under the alpha-gamma model. For more details see A. Mir, F. Rossello, L. Rotger (2013) doi:10.1016/j.mbs.2012.10.005, M. J. Sackin (1972) doi:10.1093/sysbio/21.2.225, D. H. Colless (1982) doi:10.2307/2413420.
